refnamediv.refpurpose: Get's a list of frame objects for the id3v2 frames

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public array TagLib_ID3v2_Frame::getFrameList
Returns an array of frames specified in the ID3v2 tag. The framename defined in the ID3v2 format is used as a key, while the value is a TagLib_ID3v2_Frame object or any subclass of this class.
Notice that frame names are usualy returned as specified in ID3v2.3 even the tag version is 2.2.
The attached picture frame is differs from this behaviour. The PIC frame from ID3v2.2 frames is not converted into the APIC formats.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an array with framename as key and a TagLib_ID3v2_Frame object as the value.
